overview: Starring the incomparable Deauxma, Girlfriends Films Road Queen series is a consistent repeat seller and one of our most popular long form film series. Viewers are transfixed as maturing stripper Deauxma treks across the desert Southwest in her radical custom Ford, looking for a new life â€“ and a lot of new lovers. Hot sex is served up against a backdrop of rural Americana.
tagline: She's looking for a few good women!
title: Road Queen 22
